title: refactor(http): extract helpers and consolidate redundancy
body:
## Summary

Implement refactoring opportunities identified in HTTP module pipeline analysis. This is a behavior-preserving refactor to improve maintainability.

## Function Extraction

1. **`read_body_chunked`** (SocketHTTP1-chunked.c) - Extract trailer state handler (~120 lines)
2. **`SocketHTTP2_Conn_new`** (SocketHTTP2-connection.c) - Extract 2 init helpers (~24 lines)
3. **`http2_stream_create`** (SocketHTTP2-stream.c) - Remove legacy redundant check (~6 lines)

## Redundancy Consolidation

1. Add `socket_util_arena_strdup_len()` to SocketUtil.h
2. Add `SocketSecurity_has_control_chars()` to SocketSecurity.h
3. Update call sites to use new utilities

## Files to Modify

- `src/http/SocketHTTP1-chunked.c`
- `src/http/SocketHTTP2-connection.c`
- `src/http/SocketHTTP2-stream.c`
- `include/core/SocketUtil.h`
- `include/core/SocketSecurity.h`
- `src/http/SocketHTTP-headers.c`
- `src/http/SocketHPACK-table.c`
- `src/http/SocketHTTP2-validate.c`
- `src/http/SocketHTTP-core.c`

## Expected Impact

- ~150 lines of code savings
- 2 new reusable utility functions
- Improved code maintainability
